document.full_text: can one reporter cover six major new york sporting events within a period of 24 hours and not lose his mind?  we will find out this weekend when we send mike tanier out on a mission.
document.title: this weekend: a yankees game, five other events, one reporter
lines_and_colors: can one reporter cover six major new york sporting events within a period of 24 hours and not lose his mind?  we will find out this weekend when we send mike tanier out on a mission.
